info.description: Create a forex contract to provide margin Pips in response
info.title: Create Forex

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

customerName.description: The name that is displayed for the customer

dealDate.description: The date on which the deal was made.

buyCurrency.description: The SWIFT code of the currency of the purchase

sellCurrency.description: The SWIFT code of the sold currency.

sellAmount.description: The amount of the currency being sold.

treasuryRate.description: The Treasury rate for the conversion between payment currency and the ordering currency

dealType.description: The Foreign Exchange deal type i.e. it is a Spot, Forward or a Swap transaction

dealerDesk.description: Code used to identify the dealing desk responsible for monitoring and managing Foreign exchange positions

treasuryCustomer.description: Specifies if the Counterparty of the transaction is a Treasury Customer or not

marginPercent.description: Field to state the percentage of provision to be taken

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
